translationtableentry.text: Roma, Gallia, Iberia, Cartagine, Britannia, Egitto, Germania e Grecia competono per la creazione di un impero nel Mediterraneo.
translationtableentry.result: Rome, Gaul, Iberia, Carthage, Britain, Egypt, Germany and Greece compete for the creation of an empire in the Mediterranean.

translationtableentry.text: Roma, Galia, Iberia, Cartago, Britania, Egipto, Germania y Grecia compiten por la creación de un imperio en el Mediterráneo.
translationtableentry.result: Rome, Gaul, Iberia, Carthage, Britain, Egypt, Germany and Greece compete for the creation of an empire in the Mediterranean.
